mapper.select: /* 카테고리소 조회 */ SELECT dcs.document_cate_S_code AS documentCateSCode , dcs.cp_representative_code AS cpRepresentativeCode , dcs.super_admin_id AS superAdminId , dcs.document_cate_L_code AS documentCateLCode , dcs.cate_name_L AS cateNameL , dcs.cate_name_S AS cateNameS , dcs.reg_date AS regDate FROM tb_document_cate_S AS dcs;
